JobFullDesc: Our people are a core strategic driver of Facebook’s success. We have an outstanding team working together to build and scale Facebook, and we’re striving to provide a unique experience for every person working here. The Program Manager will play a key role in our efforts to build and scale an innovative Performance experience. This role will work to improve all phases of performance: setting expectations and goals, asking for and providing feedback, and recognizing impact fairly. This requires building a deep knowledge of our existing performance process, analyzing data to identify areas for improvement, designing enhancements, driving cross-functional input, owning communication and go-to-market efforts, and measuring progress over time. They will also be responsible for assisting in the execution of the current performance process. They will collaborate with a range of partners, including HR Business Partners, Diversity & Inclusion, Learning & Development, People Analytics, and People Engineering to design and support an
